CustomField.description: If this Contact is affiliated with an Academic Program through an existing Program Enrollment record, and that Program Enrollment is related to this Course Connection, this Affiliation field is auto-populated with the Program Enrollment's Affiliation. If both conditions aren't true, then this Affiliation field is left blank.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: The Academic Program associated with this Course Connection. Represents a Contact-Account Affiliation.
CustomField.label: Affiliation
